title: Why are so many Evangelicals standing by Trump?
itunes:title: Why are so many Evangelicals standing by Trump?
description: The executive power to make judicial appointments is helping drive evangelicals support for President Trump -- and now Roy Moore. But are Christian conservatives putting their politics before their religious beliefs? What are the long-term consequences for the evangelical movement?
itunes:summary: The executive power to make judicial appointments is helping drive evangelicals support for President Trump -- and now Roy Moore. But are Christian conservatives putting their politics before their religious beliefs? What are the long-term consequences for the evangelical movement?
media:description: The executive power to make judicial appointments is helping drive evangelicals support for President Trump -- and now Roy Moore. But are Christian conservatives putting their politics before their religious beliefs?
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
itunes:author: KCRW
itunes:keywords: free speech,religious freedom,Masterpiece Cakeshop,American politics,religion,White Christian,sexual harassment,collusion,Russia investigation,President Trump,obstruction of justice
